data.title: Life 2: Episode 2 Guide
data.meta_description: This page contains a list of cheats, codes, Easter eggs, tips, and other secrets for Half-Life 2: Episode Two for PC. If you've discovered a cheat
data.text:
This page contains a list of cheats, codes, Easter eggs, tips, and other secrets for Half-Life 2: Episode Two for PC. If you've discovered a cheat you'd like to add to the page, or have a correction, please click EDIT and add it.

Hit tilde “~” and type "npc_create npc_ [name]” to spawn an NPC. Here is a list of the names you can enter for [name]:
